name: Edge of Chaos
description:
Project is currently in beta! There may be some bugs, balancing, and/or dialogue choices that don't make sense that will eventually be ironed out. However, the game is playable from start to finish in its current state.

Mysterious flame sorcerer Ammy receives a letter from her estranged father requesting assistance in rescuing her kidnapped younger sibling! Face Ammy's past in her desert homeland of Solaysha, pursue bizarre sidequests with your fellow party members, and stop a dangerous ritual to summon the God of Destruction Eed back into Lezemund!

  • Traditional JRPG combat
  • 2+ hours of gameplay
  • Multiple endings based on the player's actions in sidequests
  • Skip buttons in dialogue make repeat playthroughs easy!
  • A sense of humor taken straight out of Paper Mario
  • You can pet a cat

(Currently works only on Windows)
